headline.main: German Demands Cited; NAZIS HOLD TOWNS ON GREEK BORDER NAZI TROOPS STREAM THROUGH BULGARIA

lead_paragraph: SOFIA, Bulgaria, March 2 -- While the green-gray uniforms of German officers and soldiers mingled with the varied costumes of the Bulgarians in the streets outside, the Sobranje [Parliament] convened in extraordinary session at 6 P.M. today and ratified Bulgaria's adherence to the Three-Power Pact signed by Premier Bogdan Philoff in Vienna yesterday.
abstract: Filoff cites German demands, Parliament meeting
